title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes              There is no fee to enter Gauley River National Recreation Area. Enjoy your visit!  If you plan to visit other national parks with an entrance fee, learn more about the America the Beautiful - The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass series and fee free days in national parks.        Where can I purchase an America The Beautiful Pass?  If you are in the area, the Senior Pass and Access Pass are available at the Canyon Rim Visitor Center and Sandstone Visitor Center. For a full selection of America The Beautiful Passes contact the Monongahela National Forest Ranger Office at 304-636-1800 or to find sites near you follow this link to find all the locations that passes are sold.
